title: 表示论、Schubert 计数与谱理论研讨会于2025.5.26-5.30举办
content: International Workshop on Schubert Calculus, Representation Theory, and Spectral Theory May 26-30, 2025, at Chern Institute of Mathematics , Nankai University, Tianjin, China Speakers *=to be confirmed. Anders Buch Rutgers University Xiao-Wu Chen University of Science and Technology of China Rebecca Goldin George Mason University Peter Guo Nankai University Hualin Huang Huaqiao University Changzheng Li Sun Yet-sen University Shoumin Liu Shandongg University *Jennifer Morse University of Virginia Satoshi Naito Tokyo Institute of Technology Daisuke Sagaki University of Tsukuba Changjian Su Yau Mathematical Sciences Center Julianna Tymoczko Smith College Kai Wang Fudan University Weihong Xu Caltech Rongwei Yang State University of New York, Albany Schedule May 26 Check In May 27 TBD May 28 TBD May 29 TBD May 30 Check out at noon. Link of the updated information https://www.albany.edu/~cz954339/2025China/CIM.html Directions You can find direction to the institute at here: click Some logistics about travelling in China: click Organizers: Cristian Lenart (SUNY-Albany) E-mail: clenart@albany.edu Guilai Liu, Nankai University E-mail: liugl@mail.nankai.edu.cn Shoumin Liu (Shandong University) Email: s.liu@sdu.edu.cn Changlong Zhong (SUNY-Albany) Email: czhong@albany.edu
